descriptions.overview: The Vinehaven Swivel Dining Chairs provide comfortable dining and entertaining seating. With a rich brown frame finish, the sturdy and durable steel frames last for seasons of enjoyment. The swiveling motion on the chairs makes getting in and out and having conversations a breeze.
list: Sturdy steel frame with dark brown powder-coated finish
Tan, fade-resistant cushions included for extra comfort

reviews.title: "Dripping rust all over carpet & deck!"
reviews.text: This set is beautiful - but after the first rainfall we received the chairs were dripping rust any time they were slightly moved! This stained our brand new outdoor rug and deck. Lowe's only offered to pickup to return the chairs (and table) and said they could not offer anything to compensate us for the damages. Both the customer service line and local store manager I spoke with said I needed to contact the manufacturer. More to come on what they tell me. Very frustrated this brand new set leaks rust all over! Hindsight, I see other reviewers have mentioned the same.
reviews.author: Brenda

reviews.title: "Deceptive Packaging"
reviews.text: I'm actually not writing a review on this specific product, but on the packaging of this product at my local Lowe's store (Crestview, FL).  This chair is the product that was in the box that I brought home from Lowe's 2 days ago and I guess, might be a perfectly good product if it's what you're looking for.  The reason for my 2 stars is because the packaging is deceptive and is requiring a return to the store.  The 1st picture below shows the box that I brought home from Lowe's and the 2nd shows the insert that includes assembly instructions.  Both clearly say Garden Treasures Vinehaven "swivel rocker" chairs. I am unable to find Vinehaven swivel rocker chairs listed on Lowe's site.  The site does show Garden Treasures Elliott Creek swivel rockers which is what I will order once I return the chairs that I have.  (They are not available at my Lowe's) As soon as I unpacked the box, it appeared pretty evident to me that there was no "rocking" feature on these chairs.  The 3rd, 4th and 5th photos below show the base of the chair, the plate thing that attaches to the bottom of the chair and fits into the base and the bottom of the chair where the plate attaches to the chair.  Nothing that I could see would have the chair rock!  I decided to put one together just to be sure that I wasn't missing something.  Assembly was very easy.  After unpacking the box, it took about 10 minutes to assemble one.  All hardware was included.  But, IT DIDN'T ROCK!!  We specifically wanted chairs that rocked.  Rocking is more important that swiveling for us.  So the assembled chair and the box containing the parts for the second chair, the cushions, instructions and remaining hardware are all in the back of the truck ready for a trip to return them.  What a pain.  I paid $178 for these chairs which I guess is a pretty good price. They were originally $198 and were on sale.  The ones that I'm going to order are currently listed at $208.  $30 is a small price to pay for some decent chairs that actually rock!  I realize that the deceptive or incorrect packaging is not a Lowe's issue but rather a Garden Treasures issue.   I just want to make others who may see this product in their local store aware that it likely is not what it appears to be.
reviews.author: AO

reviews.title: "Loved it but was very quickly disappointed"
reviews.text: Bought two of these chairs along with the coffee table and the matching love seat -loved it ! super comfortable week or so after I bought it I went to go move it to put a rug underneath and it was all rusted and it was leaking water out of all the legs of the furniture which stained my patio. Lowe's came and Brought it back to return. 10 days later still haven't gotten my refund -Which by the way the manager told me would be credited within 24 hours since I bought it with Lowe's credit card- Very disappointed.
reviews.author: Plane25

reviews.title: "RUST FROM THESE CHAIRS WILL RUIN YOUR DECK!!"
reviews.text: I should have read all these reviews BEFORE our big purchase that we were so excited about. We've only had this set 2 MONTHS and after only the second rainfall, THIS is what happened! This is the worst, there are more stains throughout the furniture area, but this is the worst and the most recent. This is pitiful and everyone that has experienced this should get replacements and financial assistance for repairs on their decks, although other than replacing the planks there is nothing else really to do, the rust stains DO NOT COME OUT. Shame on you Lowe's for selling such a product that RUINS beautiful decks!
reviews.author: HannahS

reviews.title: "Perfect Fit"
reviews.text: We bought 2of these chairs last year and they worked out perfect. Good seating, comfortable and easy to assemble. They turn very easy to get in and out of. We had out of state relatives coming so thought we better buy 2 more of them. When they arrived we spent most of our time out on the deck in the chairs playing card games. I recommend these chairs. For the price they can't be beat.
reviews.author: Jimbo

reviews.title: "Rust"
reviews.text: I wish I would have read the reviews before purchasing this set. I loved this set when it was all put together. After a rainy day, I went to move the chairs and rusty water came POURING out of the corner of the chair. It has left my concrete around my pool deck damaged!  If you have this set outside, IT WILL do the same thing to you!
reviews.author: Tracie

reviews.title: "Good so far"
reviews.text: I selected these because they have both seat and back cushions. I live in a climate where temperatures in summer reach 110+ so having a metal/aluminum back wasn't practical. I also wanted a product with the swivel as that's easier to get out of than straights legs as I plan to put them on a rug. Assembly was easy...4 sets of screw/washers/nuts. They include wrenches so no tools are necessary for assembly.I plan to store the cushions indoors when not in use so that wont be an issue. I especially like the short seat as I'm only 5'2" and hate when my feet stick out off a chair.
reviews.author: Barb

reviews.title: "Parts missing"
reviews.text: Bought these chairs and I like them; however,  several of the plastic/rubber pieces on the bottom round part of the chair that keep it from touching the ground and make it level are missing.  Any idea how or where I could get these parts replaced?
reviews.author: Mom

reviews.title: "False advertising / Mislabeled Product"
reviews.text: The box that we purchased with the 2 chairs indicated that the chairs were swivel-rocker chairs.  The chairs included DO NOT SWIVEL, I feel that the box was at the very least misleading.  I see that the information here says Swivel and does not mention rocking.... Why does the box indicate rocking if the chairs are not meant to do so?
reviews.author: Denise

reviews.title: "Good for the $$$"
reviews.text: Need two dineing chairs for patio table .. Very comfy and stirdy.....Still have questions about the delivery but it was worth itHoward beach NY
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Great deck addition"
reviews.text: Easy assembly, comfy and looks great
reviews.author: Amy

reviews.title: "Bought table and chairs about 15 months ago"
reviews.text: We have been happy with these chairs until today. They are outside on a covered lanai, not rusted and have not been wet.  Husband was sitting on the chair and it collapsed under him. Not happy, should have lasted more than 16 months.
reviews.author: Ggmommy

reviews.title: "Not as durable as I expected"
reviews.text: A pair of these came as a part of a patio table set. Relatively comfortable, swivel chairs. We always took cushions in when not in use as they are not weather resistant. After 3 years both chairs are corroding at the same location - left armrest top and at the bottom weld. From the looks of the amount of metal that has oxidized beneath the paint they will not last much longer. So don't buy them expecting many years of service out of them. On the plus side the seat and back webbing has held up well.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Great upgrade for your deck or patio!"
reviews.text: We bought the while Vinehaven suite as an upgrade to ancient Tropitone furniture on our decks.  While we didn't expect the same level of quality (these are 1/4 the price of Tropitone) we were surprised at how nice they were.  Now, these are steel and foam-core cushions so don't forget to cover them when it rains - so with proper care, these should perform well.  We've had one set over a year and aside from some of the bumpers falling off the bases (typical for any such furniture) we've not had an issue.  Yes, like others, we wish they also rocked (they do offer rockers but those are much more expensive and not currently available), but these are great dining chairs.
reviews.author: RicninNH

reviews.title: "Poor quality control."
reviews.text: I purchased this set on 9/13/17. I had a few issues with the table so I'm just a bit fed up when it came to the chairs. Lack of quality control. The braces were welded in the wrong location, which means the bolt holes do not line up. If bolt holes do not like e up, the bolt cannot go thru and fasten the swivel to frame. Thus rendering this chair useless. 2 stars because of the quality control issues I've had thus far.
reviews.author: Ryan

reviews.title: "High Quality"
reviews.text: We ordered a set of these chairs to go with our patio table collection, and we are so impressed with the quality. They are sturdy, swivel easily and are the perfect finishing touch to our deck. We would highly recommend these chairs!
reviews.author: Liz

reviews.title: "Chair does not do what box says."
reviews.text: Box states contains swivel rocker.(see photo) poor advertising The chairs swivel but do NOT rock . Change the box.
reviews.author: Dan

reviews.title: "Keep it Under Cover"
reviews.text: This set is attractive and comfortable, however the cushions are not made with outdoor durable materials.  Expect to wait at least three days to be able to sit on the cushions after it rains.  Storing the cushions indoors is not a practical solution for us.  Our previous experience with Sunbrella type materials set our expectations.
reviews.author: SB

reviews.title: "Not what the box says"
reviews.text: Bought six of these chairs. They state swivel rocker chairs. They are nice looking. We liked that they were metal and not plastic. However they only swivel. For the money we paid we are not pleased. We wanted rocking swivel chairs. Which again is what the box states it is. The only way it will rock is if you want to fall backwards.
reviews.author: LTJ

reviews.title: "swivel chairs"
reviews.text: Apparent poor quality control. The post of the chair frame or the receiving tube was miss sized. The post had to be forced into the receiving tube to such an extent that the chair is bound and can not swivel.
reviews.author: jerry

reviews.title: "Pay close attention when buying"
reviews.text: I have 9 of these chairs in various types and they're gorgeous. There's 2 types under the same part number, one that rocks and another that doesn't so watch closely at the plate connector to the base when you buy it.Anyone can tell the difference by just looking at them.Also, don't leave them  in the rain, they're weather RESISTANT, not waterproof and an investment in a can of Scotch Guard would be well worth your time.
reviews.author: s1lence1

reviews.title: "Great outdoor dining set!!"
reviews.text: We have been really happy with this set over the last 3 months.  It has held up great to the rain, humidity and twin 5 year old's.  Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Will

reviews.title: "Come On, Lowe's - this is NOT a rocker!"
reviews.text: My bad - I guess I should have read the reviews first!   I also just got them home (08/19/18) and discovered they were not a rocker!  As the reviews from over a year ago pointed out.   But Lowe's continued to stock the boxed chairs with the words "cushioned swivel ROCKER chairs" And the other review is correct - they will be pain to return.  I am really disappointed in Lowe's.   I thought they were better than that.  Looks like Home Depot, Menard's, and Amazon will get more of my business.  I gave three stars because they appear to be a decent swivel chair, and easy to assemble.
reviews.author: Hazz

reviews.title: "Doesn't rock"
reviews.text: The box and paperwork says it's a swivel rocker but they don't rock. Too much trouble to return
reviews.author: None

reviews.title: "Great sturdy chair"
reviews.text: These chairs are very sturdy and easy to put together. The cushions are a cheap fabric and the batting is also not good.  After only 1 one week the bottom cushion is already flattened.
reviews.author: LisaD

reviews.title: "keep covered"
reviews.text: cushions don't dry, netting puddles without cushions on them, rust pours out of the frame and leaves stains on the deck,   these are only 6 weeks old
reviews.author: Rick

reviews.title: "Advertisment"
reviews.text: The advertisement on website did say it was a swivel rocker, now it doesn't. The manufacturer says it's a swivel rocker and it is not. When I called to find out if parts were missing or for replacement I was left on hold for 50 minutes then hung up on. I was in the middle of preparing food for a bar-b-q and watching grand babies. Do not appreciate such rude service. Correcting the websites title still does not correct my issue.
reviews.author: Danyel

reviews.title: "So far so good"
reviews.text: My husband just put these together last night in less than an hour. So far they are comfortable and swivel around well!
reviews.author: Heather

reviews.title: "Arrived damaged and ONLY swivels!"
reviews.text: We were excited about these swivel chairs but one of them arrived damaged. One of the arms were bent beyond repair and a little piece of shrapnel was visibly sticking out. Sadly, the chairs would've been decent if it didn't arrive damaged.
reviews.author: Jewleye

reviews.title: "Deck Furniture"
reviews.text: The chairs were incredibly easy to put together. The cushions are well made. The chairs are comfortable. Some concerns exist about the structural integrity due to the welding areas on the chair. But overall the chairs are very nice.
reviews.author: Jan

reviews.title: "Swivel chairs"
reviews.text: We bought the vinehaven 6 piece set on 4.10.16 n both swivel chairs are broke! One chair also is peeling paint. Contacted company n they said sorry cant help u bc u r over 1 year..PRETTY BAD YOUR PRODUCTS DON'T LAST!! poor customer service also as the response we got was beyond generic system generated....SHAME Lowe's is carrying this product...DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
reviews.author: April

reviews.title: "Bent arm"
reviews.text: I bought mine at a brick and mortar, easy to assemble, BUT after assembly, I noticed one of the arms was leaning in and found a big dent at the bottom of the arm. I was going to just ignore it...BUT the paint was chipped on the dent so it has to go back, don't want it to start rusting already. It's just aggravating because my local store had none so I had to drive an hour and a half to purchase them and now I have to drive an hour and a half to exchange them, plus assemble them. Again.
reviews.author: Raina

reviews.title: "Impossible Assembly"
reviews.text: The bolts we received with the chair are too small and we are not able to assemble the chairs. Returning to the store.
reviews.author: Kbrown

reviews.title: "Great value for swivel chairs"
reviews.text: Easy to assemble; packaged very well to prevent damage in shipping; cushions need tie downs to keep the wind from blowing them away. Very comfortable seating!
reviews.author: Miket

reviews.title: "Not waterproof"
reviews.text: Bought table and six chairs.  Comfortable but cushions are not water proofed.  Rain saturates cushions all the way thru.  We just saw review about rusty water and have moved chairs AND cushions indoors.  No way to move big rectangular table.  So frustrating and a lot of work!
reviews.author: Drivingdiva

reviews.title: "Wrong Chair For My Family.."
reviews.text: These chairs was not right for my family because I bought thinking that they we a swivel and a rocking chair. Well they only swivel, go around while seating in the chair. I feel these chairs should have been on clearance this fall time of year. Chairs just weren't for us...
reviews.author: Roy

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Wahine

reviews.title: "Rusting"
reviews.text: Bought this set for a party we were having.  Took forever to assemble as things did not line up. Next day it rained and rusty water was pouring out and all over my new deck. We stored the cushions in a deck box and the mesh was holding the water and was not filtering through. Huge wet mess!!!!  Returned them to Lowe's. They did not give me a hard time, although the girl was a little grumpy taking back the return.
reviews.author: Michelle

reviews.title: "Disappointing"
reviews.text: I purchased the 2-box set.  The box displayed damage when I picked it up; I was old the box just split when taking it down from the shelf.  I brought the chairs home, assembled the first one, put it on the deck and noticed one arm was bent in.  I took the chairs back for an exchange (aggravating) and Lowe's (who is very good about this) brought me an exchange in an undamaged box.  I came home, assembled the chairs and initially congratulated myself for a good decision, until it rained.  The pillows were like sponges.  I mistakenly assumed since they were deck patio chairs the pillows would be weather resistant; no where in the adds or directions in the box does it indicate the pillows must be removed for incriminate weather. I currently have them in the laundry room drying out (we're on the third day).  The chairs (so far) seem well built but the pillows are the reason for my three stars.  I would NOT purchase these chairs again.
reviews.author: Pokey

reviews.title: "Not good if windy"
reviews.text: The major inconvenience is that the back cushion does not have Velcro tabs like the seat does. The cushion will fly away even during mild windy weather. The base of the chair is a bit wobbly but not that bad. Also, I would have liked the option to keep it stationary or swivel.
reviews.author: Mimirules

reviews.title: "Intersting facts"
reviews.text: arms came bent in box, Trying to unbend them showed me how weak they are.  floor rubber slide buttons on bottom fall out and Lowes has NO replacements.  Under warranty, Lowes wants to send us a whole new base... thats crazy
reviews.author: al

reviews.title: "Pretty nice chairs for the $--but they don't rock."
reviews.text: The packaging and in-store signage described these as "rockers." Said so right on the box. These are sturdy, adult-sized chairs and were very easy to assemble (you have to attach the swivel base to the chair--two wrenches and hardware were provided); however, they are not rockers....the cushions are not anything great, but they are adequate. I plan on keeping them out of the rain. Have owned chairs for a couple of weeks, and have quality no issues to report as of yet. Good value for the price I paid--these were marked down to ≈$188 for the set of two, brand new in box.
reviews.author: MIke

reviews.text: I bought the set 3 months ago. and all already  two times the sun is burning the cushions and this is an outdoor set.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "Not waterproof"
reviews.text: Bought table and six chairs.  Comfortable but cushions are not water proofed.  Rain saturates cushions all the way thru.  We just saw review about rusty water and have moved chairs AND cushions indoors.  No way to move big rectangular table.  So frustrating and a lot of work!
reviews.author: Drivingdiva

reviews.title: "PERFECT"
reviews.text: We absolutely love ‘em. We also just purchased a small propane fire pit for our patio deck and these chairs go just perfect with that. There's nothing like sitting around an outdoor fire pit roasting Winnie's on a cool evening and having a comfortable chair to sit in.
reviews.author: Sunsetkid

reviews.title: "Some adjustments"
reviews.text: Had to use a wood block and a hammer to adjust brackets under the seat to get the mounting plate to line up on one of the chairs.
reviews.author: Jake

reviews.title: "Good Value"
reviews.text: They aren't as comfortable and nice as something you might buy at Sam's or Costco, but they are nice and comfortable enough.  They were very easy to assemble.  I'll probably replace with nicer, more colorful cushions next summer.
reviews.author: shannonsfolly

reviews.title: "Nice chairs"
reviews.text: They look very nice but are not as comfortable as I wish.
reviews.author: Scm55

reviews.title: "Love them!"
reviews.text: These chairs are great. I've had no problems with them. They are comfy and look good, easy to put together, only 2 pices. Will be buying another set very soon. Have had current set for 3 months and they faired very well after hurricane Irma in a last min evacuate decision and stayed outside during the storm in St. Petersburg, FL. Would deffanatly recommend. Again great for the price comparison to other chairs.
reviews.author: JBock

reviews.title: "Poor Delivery Service and Damaged Product"
reviews.text: Ordered this online and set up for delivery. The delivery service confirmed the package was delivered, but no package was at my house. Turns out they delivered my order to a house four blocks away. Luckily that person was nice and allowed us to haul the box from their house to mine, which was not easy. Chairs also appear to have small chips in the powder coating. Would not recommend purchasing from Lowe's
reviews.author: Harry

reviews.text: Brought this set back in April. Since then had to replace all the chairs for rust. Now the seat cushions are ripping. I have called six times to replace the cushion and keep getting the run around. Finally heard from the manufacturer to be told the cushions are on back order until September. So glad I spent money on a brand new set that is already falling apart!
reviews.author: Mary

reviews.title: "Rusty water"
reviews.text: We purchased these chairs 7/4.  They have been on our new patio since and each time it rains, they leak rusty water that's staining our patio.  The chairs are very  comfy, but we will be returning them.  They are outdoor furniture!  They shouldn't be rusting this soon.
reviews.author: Carrie

reviews.title: "Good chairs!"
reviews.text: Very easy to put together and look nice. They are comfortable, the only reason I dinged them 1 star is because there is no way to secure the top cushion. The bottom cushions are secured with velcro but the top cushions are just sitting there. Every time the wind blows, they fall down. They swivel, which was very important to me, but there is no "gentle" rocking motion.
reviews.author: MaMaJ

reviews.title: "Great chairs for the price!"
reviews.text: We bought four chairs.  They were easy to assemble except one.  I had to grind out a misaligned hole.  Two wrenches and hardware are included in shrink wrap.  The shipping boxes had metal frames so the chairs arrived in great shape.  The cushions are comfortable, and as we found out, water repellant.  I'm 5'6" and my SO is 5'2".  These chairs don't sit quite as high as other chairs we sat in, so they didn't cut into our lower legs.  So for us, more comfortable than higher priced models.  $168 on sale for two chairs is a bargain.
reviews.author: Al

reviews.title: "Nice looking and comfortable"
reviews.text: Bought 2 for our sun room. They are very comfortable and don't take up a lot of floor space. Cushions are good. Chairs swivel but don't rock; we knew this when we purchased them. Nice chairs for the price.
reviews.author: Pat

reviews.title: "Great Chairs"
reviews.text: These are nice and comfortable chairs for my decking.  Easy to assemble and shipped very fast from Lowe's. Holding up quite well in all kinds of weather.  Would highly recommend these for your deck or patio.  I also have four chairs like these only with legs from same manufacture.  Also holding up well.
reviews.author: Retired

reviews.text: We have to clean up rust after rain and morning dew.  Extremely hot in the heat.  Wish we would have added more wicker to our collection.   Paid $60.00 delivery fee!  We also purchased the lg umbrella with solar lights.  Covers the table not the chairs.  Should be recommended to be under patio cover.
reviews.author: jimval

reviews.title: "Nice chairs, esp. for the price"
reviews.text: Bought a set of two last year for a covered porch. Comfortable. Great value. Nice color to go with almost anything. Left the chairs out all winter. The cushions were put away when not in use. The chairs held up great. Bought another set this year for a patio.
reviews.author: Terri

reviews.title: "Not Bad"
reviews.text: The chairs were easy to put together and are pretty comfortable.  The chairs DO NOT SWIVEL....I'm not sure why the title shows that they do but they don't.  For the price you can beat it.  I'm using these in a covered front porch so they should last.
reviews.author: Aim

reviews.title: "Comfy and nice looking"
reviews.text: This is a comfortable, nice looking chair at an affordable price.  No sooner had we gotten it set out on the deck but we had a heavy downpour of rain.  The cushions dried out well without any obvious staining or odor.
reviews.author: Sunny

reviews.title: "Rusty in less then 2 years"
reviews.text: Had chairs for less then 2 years and one of the is rusting already. My carpet is a mess from the rust leaking out. I have no idea how it is rusting on the inside
reviews.author: Deb

reviews.title: "Nice pair"
reviews.text: Paint had a few scuffs after taking it out of the box, even though the pieces were wrapped in paper. Nice set though, perfect for a small space on our patio.
reviews.author: Liz

reviews.title: "Comfy chairs"
reviews.text: We thought we were only getting one chair only to find out it was the price for 2 of them. Very pleased with the quality so far.
reviews.author: Gail

reviews.title: "Nice Chairs"
reviews.text: We love these chairs and for now we use them on the pool deckVery comfortable and easy to clean upGreat product
reviews.author: Q

reviews.title: "Garden Treasure Steel Swivel Chairs"
reviews.text: 5 Star. Easy to assemble. Comfortable Cusions. Excellent Quality. Love the swivel and rocking action.
reviews.author: Jack

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble, comfortable seat"
reviews.text: Chair had all hardware and tools included, assembled easy and is comfortable to sit in.
reviews.author: Themanpcl

reviews.title: "Great for the price"
reviews.text: We purchased a six piece set with two swivel chairs, four stationary chairs, and tile table for $598.  We received free delivery which was very coordinated and followed up with a customer rating.  The chairs were a snap to assemble.  We love them and have them in a covered lanai.  Very comfy and looks great.
reviews.author: Doug

reviews.title: "Good purchase for the price."
reviews.text: Not sure on how they will hold up, trying to be optimistic about them.
reviews.author: Retired

reviews.title: "Not a rocking chair."
reviews.text: We bought these expecting rocking chairs as that is what is said on the box, however they dont rock at all!! No truth in advertising there!
reviews.author: Lisa

reviews.title: "Comfortable and sturdy swivel chair"
reviews.text: The chair is well made and comfortable to sit in.  Swivels very smoothly and looks great.
reviews.author: ToyotaRick

reviews.title: "Patio chairs"
reviews.text: Solid and attractive swivel patio chairs. Here is to many long years of enjoyment.
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Comfortable"
reviews.text: I have been looking for a good buy on these type of chairs because they are expensive to buy one at a time. I just happened upon this deal one night when I couldn't sleep. I am actually thinking of buying another set. Love them. Very comfortable and good for people who have back problems. Would recommend very highly!!!!
reviews.author: Turtle

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: salesman1

reviews.title: "Great patio chair"
reviews.text: I like this chair!! It swivels very nicely and also the cushions are high quality. We bought two and one of the bolts was missing for the bottom, but luckily my hubby is handy so he found a new bolt in his garage. Other than that they're good.
reviews.author: Happyhelen

reviews.title: "Looks great!"
reviews.text: Just assembled the chairs today. They look great and were simple to assemble.  Packaging of the nuts and bolts were well organized. There were some minor flaws in the finish even though they were packaged well.
reviews.author: Moe T

reviews.title: "Nice Chairs for the Price"
reviews.text: I bought this set of two chairs on sale and they are a great chairs.  Cushions are a little thin but still comfortable.  Chairs swivel but don't rock.  Happy with the purchase at sale price.
reviews.author: runnergirl

reviews.title: "Nice addition!!"
reviews.text: Purchased on line for extra seating on back patio.  Works wonderful, blends in with other pieces.  Neutral colors are perfect can accent with anything!!  Wish they rocked, but works great!!
reviews.author: Sirena

reviews.title: "Great Chairs!"
reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these on sale. They were easy to assemble, look great and are very comfy! Love that they swivel. Would be even better if they reclined slightly but no complaints overall!
reviews.author: Nestle

reviews.title: "So comfy!"
reviews.text: I got this set for Mother's day. They were very simple to put together. They look great on my porch, and are the most comfortable outside chairs I've ever owned.
reviews.author: CountryBlessed

reviews.title: "Good Product"
reviews.text: Very solid and went together pretty easily.  A rocker feature would have been nice but it is comfortable.  Back pillow will blow away - since it doesn't velcro.
reviews.author: MikeG

reviews.title: "Great Chair"
reviews.text: Garden Treasures Vinehaven Set of Set of Set of 2 Steel Swivel Dining Chair(s) with Tan Cushioned. Well made comfortable chair.
reviews.author: none

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: Sturdy lightweight chairs. Some minor assembly needed but only took 10 minutes. Swivel easily and padded cushions are comfy.
reviews.author: Ifh2munnn

reviews.title: "Comfort plus, strong, easy to assemble."
reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. Cushions thick, everything you need to assemble chairs in box. So easy.  Love them!!
reviews.author: Junbug

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: Good chair for the price.  Nice swivel but no tilt.  Thin cheaper cushions though.  I will be replacing those.
reviews.author: Vievela

reviews.title: "patio chairs"
reviews.text: great product I put the chairs in my porch when my baby is playing in the front yard... highly recommended
reviews.author: Hartley

reviews.text: Chairs are built well, when together easily. Very happy with chairs, wish top cushion had tie downs.
reviews.author: Yonk

reviews.title: "great chairs"
reviews.text: light weight enough to move easily, very comfortable and a perfect height for patio dining table.
reviews.author: crafty

reviews.title: "Patio chairs"
reviews.text: Perfect for the small space i have on my patio.chairs are comfortable and very easy to assemble.
reviews.author: Bev

reviews.title: "Great chairs, very comfortable"
reviews.text: I bought a set of these chairs a couple years ago and wanted another set to make seating for 4
reviews.author: Arizona Room

reviews.title: "Great quality"
reviews.text: These chairs are great quality and very easy to assemble.  I would recommend them to anyone.
reviews.author: ADS

reviews.title: "Very nice quality"
reviews.text: Very nice quality, only complaint would be wish the seat  cushion was a little thicker.
reviews.author: Matt

reviews.title: "Cushions poor quality"
reviews.text: Bought this set a year ago and the cushions are flimsy and flat...not good quality...
reviews.author: Mariella

reviews.title: "Patio Dining Chairs that swivel"
reviews.text: My husband and I are enjoying our new chairs. Very comfortable and should wear well.
reviews.author: Jan

reviews.title: "Nice swivel chairs"
reviews.text: Well made, looks great, and the price was excellent! Matches the Loveseat perfectly
reviews.author: Cooter

reviews.text: Love the look, love the comfiness. The swivel is perfect for the dinner table.
reviews.author: Dougandmaylena

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: jj

reviews.title: "good"
reviews.text: the chairs are attractive and sturdy but the cushions are very thin.
reviews.author: lorsan

reviews.title: "Heavy duty chair and comfortable to set on."
reviews.text: I believe this chair will hold up with heavy people and not break.
reviews.author: Denny

reviews.title: "Very good"
reviews.text: I bought four. Easy to put together. Works well for my purpose.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "nice chairs"
reviews.text: boxed well, put together easy, nice color and nice to sit in
reviews.author: jaqc

reviews.title: "Cushions"
reviews.text: These are a lot better than the ones you sell individually.
reviews.author: Jenny

reviews.title: "Dining swivel chair"
reviews.text: Nice comfortable chair, like the swivel. Would buy again
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.text: Very comfortable. Looks good and everything I needed.
reviews.author: Ringer

reviews.title: "Very pleased"
reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she loves them.

questions.question: "Can I purchase replacement cushions for these chairs. If so, how?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Corsan Customer Service
answers.text: We appreciate your interest in our Vinehaven Set. Please call 800-723-8826 for replacement parts & provide item numbers: 0804797-D (Back Cushion) 0804797-C (Seat Cushion)

answers.author: SMT
answers.text: Don't bother calling about replacement cushions. They won't sell you any as they are reserved for warranty issues only. You're directed to buy standard patio cushions none of which have Velcro ties like the ones that come with the chairs. Might be easier and more economical to buy a new set of chairs!

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: Please call 800-723-8836 for availability and pricing.

answers.author: Roy
answers.text: No they do not rock just swivel..

answers.author: Anonymous
answers.text: The 2-count Steel Swivel Dining Chairs also have a slight tilt motion.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, this will rock.

answers.author: Melanie
answers.text: These chairs do not rock. They only swivel. I do not count the slight wiggle as "rocking" like a traditional rocker chair will.

answers.author: Anonymous
answers.text: The 2-count steel dining chairs do have a slight rocking motion.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The manual does not mention if it can rock.

questions.question: "Do these chairs rock and swivel or just swivel?"
questions.author: cb

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: These chairs swivel only.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: These chairs just swivel.

questions.question: "How tall is the chair from the seat to the ground?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The seat height is 17.5".

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The seat height is 15.35 inches.

questions.question: "How many pounds will this chair hold?"
questions.author: Chris

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The weight capacity is 250 lbs. per chair.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The chair has a 300 pound capacity.

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The weight capacity is 250 lbs. per chair.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The weight capacity of this chair is 250 pounds.

questions.question: "What color is the frame on these chairs? Previous answers show both brown and grey?"
questions.author: Dar

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The color of this frame is brown.

answers.author: Anonymous
answers.text: Thank you for taking the time to inquire about the Vinehaven Set of 2 Steel Patio Dining Cairs. Per the specifications, the frame color/finish is brown.

questions.question: "what is the weight limit on this chair?"
questions.author: jim

answers.author: Product Manufacturer
answers.text: The weight limit is 250 lbs.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: The weight limit is 250 lbs.

questions.question: "What is under the cushion--metal bars, rubber straps, or fabric sling?"
questions.author: Mel

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: A fabric sling rests under the seat cushion.

answers.author: Anonymous
answers.text: The Vinehaven 2-count Steel Swivel Patio Dining Chairs bottom cushion rests on a fabric sling.
